long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the potential of AI writing and GPT on any website with Chippy — your AI browser assistant. Whether it's answering queries, responding to emails, or fostering idea generation, I'm here to facilitate seamless interactions!

Simply press ctrl or cmd + j when you need assistance!

Here's how Chippy elevates your browsing experience:
🧑‍💻 AI Writer: Access ChatGPT's prowess on any page, aiding in content creation, and responding smartly on the go!

🧠 On-Page Search: Narrow down your search on the current page for more precise context or information, transcending ChatGPT's knowledge cutoff.

😌 Effortless Input: Forget the tedious copy & paste routine; open Chippy, select the text, and let the automation magic happen!

💡 Suggested prompts: No more staring at a blinking cursor; I'll propel you forward with suggestive prompts and engaging follow-up questions.

🧠 Boost Productivity: Summarize articles, elucidate text, and spark creativity to keep the momentum going.

💻 Programmer Sidekick: Your coding endeavors just got easier with bug fixes, code explanations, syntax guidance, and best practice recommendations.

📜 Translation Helper: Need a translation? Chippy's got your back.

🔒 Privacy-Centric: Your conversations are stored locally, ensuring full control and privacy.

For a deeper dive, visit https://chippyai.com

Not Affiliated with Microsoft
